name: 東江
message: "Simple yet effective, no? How does it feel?"

name: 東江
message: "I should hope so. Either way, with a few words, I've crushed the dream you held in your heart. And with it, your very soul."

name: 東江
message: "Your wish was to kill me, then end your own life?"

name: 東江
message: "Not precisely. I've merely used sound to, in a manner of speaking, 'plant a seed' in your mind."

name: 東江
message: "My goal is to unlock the human heart. Lay it bare. I can hardly remain above the fray."

name: 東江
message: "It is only fitting that I be both scientist... and subject."

name: 東江
message: "The seed I planted in your mind cannot be removed without the use of Scrap."

name: 東江
message: "So I'm afraid you will never have your desire. You may kill me, but you will go on. A living death, so to speak."

name: 東江
message: "...How does it feel? I imagine death would be a welcome reprieve in comparison."

name: 東江
message: "This is my final gift to you. Do enjoy it."
